content:
June is National Dairy Month, a time to honor the country's dairy producers and acknowledge the delicious importance of milk, yogurt and cheese in a well-balanced diet.
?
What better way to celebrate such a cheesy holiday than with baby animal photos?
?

title: 15 udderly adorable baby cows and goats
